EmailTemplate.name: Accelerating Digital Drip V1.Send Email #5.Subject Line Test
EmailTemplate.subject: Humanize Your Digital Banking Experience
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Social Media Starter Kit ${CTAText} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> In the blink of an eye, everything changed. And in this time of infinitely fewer face-to-face interactions, your customers want to know you still offer the same commitment, service and advice they’ve come to know and trust.
The good news is, there are many ways your technology can help you maintain meaningful connections.
We’ve created several resources to help you harness your technology to humanize the experience and make a difference for your customers. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> For messaging samples, download our free social media starter kit <[[https://www.ncr.com/content/dam/web/documents/coronavirus/Social_Media_Starter_Kit-Harnessing_Technology_to_Stay_Connected.pdf]]> or digital banking awareness toolkit <[[https://ncr.quickbase.com/up/bkdhk66i6/g/rd8/ei/va/Digital Banking_Fast%2C Simple%2C and Safe.zip]]>. Did you know?
You can get free marketing campaign toolkits, customizable campaigns, videos, research reports and more to help {{company.Company Name:default=you}} differentiate with digital. Start here <[[https://www.ncr.com/banking/digital-banking/2020/digital-transformation?utm_source=outbound_email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=acceleratingdigital&utm_content=email1&utm_industry=digital-banking]]>.
